stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question.

features.html:
A drop in credit card fees causes people to use credit cards more often for transactions and demand less money.

  1. Using a correctly labeled graph of the money market, show how the nominal interest rate will be affected.

  2. Given the interest rate change in part (a), what will happen to bond prices in the short run?

  3. Given the interest rate change in part (a), what will happen to the price level in the short run? Explain.

  4. Assume the countryâ€™s banking system has limited reserves. Identify an open-market operation the central bank could use to keep the nominal interest rate constant at the level that existed before the drop in credit card fees. Explain.
